Even after that, I continued to fight.
I fought against stronger and stronger foes,
but they were all too weak.
In the end, it never worked out.
It became so boring that I stopped
putting up trophies of my victory.

I like winning all the time, though.
But it's boring to know I'd always win.
That I got excited by close fights.
If a Succubus becomes like that,
what do you think will happen to
That's what happened. It seems I've
also become too strong as a Succubus.
I wanted to enjoy the fight, so I dared
to go easy, but that didn't matter.
The more fun I think it is, the less
my opponent can show their potential.
There was a conflict between what
I want and what I can get.
And once I understood that, suddenly
I don't want anything to do with it anymore.
And then I took her under my wing.
what I said back then, Tahati?
"If you can make me happy, then
I'll do anything you want"... was it?

The last bout was exceptionally tough.
We were all drenched in each other's juices.
In any cases, she entertained me.
Back then, there was Tyvar and Kilma,
and later came Muracca, Valco, Luora...
Wouldn't you find anyone who could've
fought you as equals if you searched
hard enough in the outside world?
But there's no use thinking about it now.
I fought against all the Lords of Reason.

Ino's so weak to charm that I don't
think it'll even be a fight, though...

to a fight. And the result? ...Fufufu,
